verses.text: Quickly, God, deliver \w me|strong="H2142"\w*, hasten \w to|strong="H1732"\w* help \w me|strong="H2142"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*.
\w May|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* seeking \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life, \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded.

\w May|strong="H5315"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w delight|strong="H2655"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* defeated \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w brought|strong="H3637"\w* \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w dishonor|strong="H3637"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7725"\w* \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* who seek \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* glad \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. \w May|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* who love \w your|strong="H5921"\w* salvation \w say|strong="H7725"\w*, “Glory \w to|strong="H7725"\w* God,” evermore.

\w I|strong="H3605"\w* am \w weak|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H8055"\w* needy: \w make|strong="H1431"\w* haste, God, \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w me|strong="H1245"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1245"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w and|strong="H8055"\w* \w deliverer|strong="H3444"\w*; \nd Lord\nd*, don’t delay.
